########################################################################
# Include python install macros
########################################################################
include(GrPython)
if(NOT PYTHONINTERP_FOUND)
    return()
endif()

add_subdirectory(bindings)

########################################################################
# Install python sources
########################################################################
GR_PYTHON_INSTALL(
    FILES
    __init__.py
    fqsweep_corr.py
    burstsilence_corr.py DESTINATION ${GR_PYTHON_DIR}/xfdm_sync
)

########################################################################
# Handle the unit tests
########################################################################
include(GrTest)

set(GR_TEST_TARGET_DEPS gnuradio-xfdm_sync)
set(GR_TEST_PYTHON_DIRS ${CMAKE_BINARY_DIR}/python/bindings)
GR_ADD_TEST(qa_sc_delay_corr ${PYTHON_EXECUTABLE} ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/qa_sc_delay_corr.py)
GR_ADD_TEST(qa_sc_tagger ${PYTHON_EXECUTABLE} ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/qa_sc_tagger.py)
GR_ADD_TEST(qa_xcorr_tagger ${PYTHON_EXECUTABLE} ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/qa_xcorr_tagger.py)
GR_ADD_TEST(qa_frame_gate ${PYTHON_EXECUTABLE} ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/qa_frame_gate.py)
GR_ADD_TEST(qa_fqsweep_corr ${PYTHON_EXECUTABLE} ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/qa_fqsweep_corr.py)
GR_ADD_TEST(qa_burstsilence_corr ${PYTHON_EXECUTABLE} ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/qa_burstsilence_corr.py)
GR_ADD_TEST(qa_sync_tag_align_cc ${PYTHON_EXECUTABLE} ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/qa_sync_tag_align_cc.py)
